sentences.english: Cao Zheng waiting to militia, stop von instructor Zhang Bingfei trial.
sentences.chinese: 曹政等人前往民兵連，阻止馮指導員審訊張秉飛。

sentences.english: First came the PLA men, then the people's militia.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放軍走在前面，其次是民兵。

sentences.english: Without saying a word, the militiamen shot and killed him.
sentences.chinese: 民兵們二話不說，開槍把他打死了。

sentences.english: Militants burn NATO fuel tankers in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦民兵燒燬北約運油車。

sentences.english: The militiaman walked the spy off.
sentences.chinese: 民兵把那個特務帶走了。

sentences.english: Eventually, they came to Ms Mujawamariya's door.
sentences.chinese: 最後，民兵來到穆加瓦瑪瑞亞女士的家門前。

sentences.english: A militiaman happened to notice the rascal.
sentences.chinese: 一位民兵偶然注意到了這個壞傢伙。

sentences.english: The frontier guards together with the militiamen drove out the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 邊防戰士和民兵一起把入侵者趕了出去。

sentences.english: In the national day parade square foot teams, women militiamen last appearance.
sentences.chinese: 在國慶閱兵徒步方隊中，女民兵方隊最後一個亮相。

sentences.english: Then of course there are the sort of ethnic-based militias.
sentences.chinese: 當然，肯定存在一些種族主義上的民兵。

sentences.english: Many thousands of people have been forced out of their homes and many schools have been taken over by militia.
sentences.chinese: 好幾千人被迫離鄉背井，許多學校被民兵佔據。

sentences.english: Italian crossbow militia, armoured with mail and a pavise.
sentences.chinese: 巨盾持弩民兵裝備鍊甲和全身巨盾。

sentences.english: Far-reaching division militia movement a big way, radiation is also wider.
sentences.chinese: 大辦民兵師運動影響深遠，輻射也較廣。

sentences.english: The brigade arrived voluntarily at a center set up to integrate militia fighters into the national army, Ironside told CNN.
sentences.chinese: 他們主動來到一個專門爲民兵同國民軍混合的中心區。

sentences.english: A car is set alight next to the pro-government militia base.
sentences.chinese: 在親政府的民兵組織基地周圍，一輛汽車被點燃。

sentences.english: Archer Militia are armed with a small bow, knife and if lucky enough, some armour.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭民兵裝備獵弓和短刀，部分幸運士兵可配備盔甲。
